update-offsets-live.name: Update On Text Change
update-offsets-live.description:
Attempts to update the Sprite Offsets anytime the Text Inputs are changed. 
Toggleable in case this causes instability issues for anyone. Most notable issue is messing up the Touch Priority of the mod's popup. Installing the 'Better Touch Prio' mod is recommended in case you wanna keep this feature on.

renders-path.name: Renders Folder
renders-path.description: Where to save the Icon Renders to. Defaults to this mod's config directory.

bg-color.name: Render Background Color
bg-color.description: Defines the BG color to use for the renders. Defaults to transparent (which is best, honestly)

extra-swing-space.name: Render - Extra Swing Space
extra-swing-space.description: Adds extra space to Swing Renders to make sure the Swing Fires fit inside the render, and aren't cut off.

animate-swing-fires.name: Animate Swing Fires
animate-swing-fires.description: Plays the in-game looping Fire Animation on the preview's Swing Fires

draw-hitbox-fill.name: Draw Hitbox Fill
draw-hitbox-fill.description:
Enables drawing the hitbox fill in the Workbench Hitbox preview. 

In case you're wondering why you can toggle this and not the border, it's because the border is mainly controlled via the slider in the popup.
